scheme_data.description:
The name of this welfare scheme is Akanksha Housing Scheme. It is also known as Ahs. Akanksha Housing Scheme was launched by the Housing Department, Government of West Bengal on 28/02/2014 to provide housing to the serving State Government employees. The present project is situated in premises No. 07/300, Block-DB, Action Area-ID at New Town, Kolkata - 700107 on a pilot basis. The project has been designed on a no-profit no-loss basis and without the cost of the land. The instant project is spread over 5.0599 acres of land and comprising of 13 towers. (7 nos. of G+10 Towers for Elegant, Premium and Classic categories and 6 nos. of Straight 4 towers for Economy and Standard categories) containing of 576 flats and 236 covered Car parking spaces and 35 open Car parking spaces (only for Elegant, Premium and Classic categories) with provision for Gymnasium, Club-House and Community Hall within the Complex. The scheme targets beneficiaries such as Individual. It is specifically implemented in West Bengal. Additionally, the nodal department is Housing Department.

It falls under the categories: Housing & Shelter.

Eligibility criteria include: All serving State Govt. employees as defined in West Bengal Service Rules, except those State Govt. employees who have their own housing scheme such as `Pratyasha’ for Policemen or similar housing schemes under Government of West Bengal stated in Memorandum No. FD647 dated 29th August, 2014 of the Finance Department of Govt. of West Bengal may apply for New Town Project under `AKANKSHA HOUSING SCHEME’ (AHS). For more information, please refer to: West Bengal Housing Website:  https://wbhousing.gov.in/general-terms-condition Tags associated with the scheme include: Housing, State Government Employees, West Bengal.

[{"text": "You must select Apply."}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "After you’ve chosen all of your terms and conditions."}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "An Govt. employees who have their own housing scheme such as `Pratyasha’ for Policemen or similar housing schemes under Government of West Bengal stated in Memorandum No. FD-647 dated 29th August, 2014 ", "eligibilityDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "All serving State Govt. employees as defined in West Bengal Service Rules, except those State Govt. employees who have their own housing scheme such as `Pratyasha’ for Policemen or similar housing schemes under Government of West Bengal stated in Memorandum No. FD-647 dated 29th August, 2014 of the Finance Department of Govt. of West Bengal may apply for New Town Project under `AKANKSHA HOUSING SCHEME’ (AHS)."}]}]}}, "slug": "ahs"}, "schemeDataHi": {"_id": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8", "hi": null, "slug": "ahs"}, "faqs": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b5be95060e4e057a2ac85", "en": {"faqs": [{"question": "Are central government employees eligible for this scheme?", "answer": "No, only West Bengal state government employees are eligible for this scheme"}, {"question": "Can a person with higher grade pay than ₹8900 apply for house under this scheme?", "answer": "Yes, for them, the type of house available is 'Elegant', which is a 3 BHK house with 2 balconies."}, {"question": "Can the employees of PSU apply under this scheme?", "answer": "No, only the state government employees are eligible."}, {"question": "Can a person apply jointly with a family member in this scheme?", "answer": "Yes, a person can apply jointly for a house under this scheme, but only with spouse."}, {"question": "What happens if the conflict arises between the builder and purchaser?", "answer": "All disputes and differences by and between the parties and / or the said buildings and / or anything done in pursuance hereby shall be referred for arbitration to such person as may be appointed by the Housing Department as the sole arbitrator for adjudication in accordance with the Indian arbitration law in force. The decision of the Arbitrator shall be binding upon the parties."}, {"question": "Can the owner resell the house after buying it?", "answer": "No, The owners of the property will not be able to sell the property to any person upto a period of 15 (Fifteen) years from the date of purchase, or his/her retirement from Government services, whichever is later."}, {"question": "When does the owner get possession of the property?", "answer": "All allottees will take over the possession within 15 (fifteen) days from the date of issue of intimation letter regarding completion of the project irrespective of Completion Certificate obtained from the concerned authority."}, {"question": "Who will bear the cost of registration and deed of conveyance?", "answer": "Cost of registration of the deed of conveyance will be borne by the allottee."}, {"question": "How will the allottees be selected?", "answer": "The allottees will be selected on the basis of a transparent lottery system from all the complete applications received. Immediately after the conduct of lottery, a provisional Allotment Letter (PAL) will be issued to all the successful candidates."}, {"question": "Is car parking space available for all?", "answer": "Department do not give any assurance to provide Car Parking Space to each and every allottee, however, the Car Parking Space so available will be distributed among the allottees by holding a separate lottery at separate cost to be so fixed up by the Department. The cost of such Car parking space shall be paid at a time within 30 (Thirty) days from the date of such lottery of Car parking space."}, {"question": "What would be the payment schedule for Elegant, premium, and classic houses?", "answer": "The payment will be made in 6 parts - Application Money (₹25,000/-), Allotment money (40% of the Tentative total price to be paid within 45 days of the Allotment order), and 4 Installments, i.e., 20% payment Within 30 Days Of Completion Of 6th Floor Slab, 30% payment within 30 Days Of Completion Of 9th Floor Slab, 10% payment within 30 Days Of Completion Of Entire Building, and residual amount before taking possession."}, {"question": "What Would Be The Payment Schedule For Economy and standard flats?", "answer": "The Payment Will Be Made In 3 Parts - Application Money (₹25,000/-), Allotment Money (20% of the tentative total price including application money to be paid within 45 days of the Allotment order), And Residual amount of the final price to be paid before possession"}]}, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "faqsHi": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b5be95060e4e057a2ac85", "hi": null, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "docs": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b55632d1dcce176ba377d", "en": {"documents_required": [{"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Copy of Identity Card"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Online application with deposit amount of ₹25,000 as "Application money" in any branch of Bank of Baroda by generating challan through online system."}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Copy of Aadhar Card"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Residence proof of the applicant of the state of West Bengal"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Income certificate of the applicant."}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}]}, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "docsHi": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b55632d1dcce176ba377d", "hi": null, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "applicationChannels": []}, "__N_SSG": true}

sentences.sent: The name of this welfare scheme is Akanksha Housing Scheme.
It is also known as Ahs.
Akanksha Housing Scheme was launched by the Housing Department, Government of West Bengal on 28/02/2014 to provide housing to the serving State Government employees.
The present project is situated in premises No.
07/300, Block-DB, Action Area-ID at New Town, Kolkata - 700107 on a pilot basis.
The project has been designed on a no-profit no-loss basis and without the cost of the land.
The instant project is spread over 5.
0599 acres of land and comprising of 13 towers.
(7 nos.
of G+10 Towers for Elegant, Premium and Classic categories and 6 nos.

of Straight 4 towers for Economy and Standard categories) containing of 576 flats and 236 covered Car parking spaces and 35 open Car parking spaces (only for Elegant, Premium and Classic categories) with provision for Gymnasium, Club-House and Community Hall within the Complex.
The scheme targets beneficiaries such as Individual.
It is specifically implemented in West Bengal.
Additionally, the nodal department is Housing Department.
It falls under the categories: Housing & Shelter.
Eligibility criteria include: All serving State Govt.
employees as defined in West Bengal Service Rules, except those State Govt.
employees who have their own housing scheme such as `Pratyasha’ for Policemen or similar housing schemes under Government of West Bengal stated in Memorandum No.
FD647 dated 29th August, 2014 of the Finance Department of Govt.
of West Bengal may apply for New Town Project under `AKANKSHA HOUSING SCHEME’ (AHS).
For more information, please refer to: West Bengal Housing Website: https://wbhousing.
gov.
in/general-terms-condition Tags associated with the scheme include: Housing, State Government Employees, West Bengal.

"}]}]}}, "slug": "ahs"}, "schemeDataHi": {"_id": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8", "hi": null, "slug": "ahs"}, "faqs": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b5be95060e4e057a2ac85", "en": {"faqs": [{"question": "Are central government employees eligible for this scheme?
", "answer": "No, only West Bengal state government employees are eligible for this scheme"}, {"question": "Can a person with higher grade pay than \u20b98900 apply for house under this scheme?
", "answer": "Yes, for them, the type of house available is 'Elegant', which is a 3 BHK house with 2 balconies.
"}, {"question": "Can the employees of PSU apply under this scheme?
", "answer": "No, only the state government employees are eligible.
"}, {"question": "Can a person apply jointly with a family member in this scheme?
", "answer": "Yes, a person can apply jointly for a house under this scheme, but only with spouse.
"}, {"question": "What happens if the conflict arises between the builder and purchaser?

", "answer": "All disputes and differences by and between the parties and / or the said buildings and / or anything done in pursuance hereby shall be referred for arbitration to such person as may be appointed by the Housing Department as the sole arbitrator for adjudication in accordance with the Indian arbitration law in force.
The decision of the Arbitrator shall be binding upon the parties.
"}, {"question": "Can the owner resell the house after buying it?

", "answer": "No, The owners of the property will not be able to sell the property to any person upto a period of 15 (Fifteen) years from the date of purchase, or his/her retirement from Government services, whichever is later.
"}, {"question": "When does the owner get possession of the property?

", "answer": "All allottees will take over the possession within 15 (fifteen) days from the date of issue of intimation letter regarding completion of the project irrespective of Completion Certificate obtained from the concerned authority.
"}, {"question": "Who will bear the cost of registration and deed of conveyance?
", "answer": "Cost of registration of the deed of conveyance will be borne by the allottee.
"}, {"question": "How will the allottees be selected?
", "answer": "The allottees will be selected on the basis of a transparent lottery system from all the complete applications received.
Immediately after the conduct of lottery, a provisional Allotment Letter (PAL) will be issued to all the successful candidates.
"}, {"question": "Is car parking space available for all?

", "answer": "Department do not give any assurance to provide Car Parking Space to each and every allottee, however, the Car Parking Space so available will be distributed among the allottees by holding a separate lottery at separate cost to be so fixed up by the Department.
The cost of such Car parking space shall be paid at a time within 30 (Thirty) days from the date of such lottery of Car parking space.
"}, {"question": "What would be the payment schedule for Elegant, premium, and classic houses?

", "answer": "The payment will be made in 6 parts - Application Money (\u20b925,000/-), Allotment money (40% of the Tentative total price to be paid within 45 days of the Allotment order), and 4 Installments, i.
e.

, 20% payment Within 30 Days Of Completion Of 6th Floor Slab, 30% payment within 30 Days Of Completion Of 9th Floor Slab, 10% payment within 30 Days Of Completion Of Entire Building, and residual amount before taking possession.
"}, {"question": "What Would Be The Payment Schedule For Economy and standard flats?

", "answer": "The Payment Will Be Made In 3 Parts - Application Money (\u20b925,000/-), Allotment Money (20% of the tentative total price including application money to be paid within 45 days of the Allotment order), And Residual amount of the final price to be paid before possession"}]}, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "faqsHi": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b5be95060e4e057a2ac85", "hi": null, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "docs": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b55632d1dcce176ba377d", "en": {"documents_required": [{"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Copy of Identity Card"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Online application with deposit amount of \u20b925,000 as \"Application money\" in any branch of Bank of Baroda by generating challan through online system.

"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Copy of Aadhar Card"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Residence proof of the applicant of the state of West Bengal"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Income certificate of the applicant.

"}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}]}, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "docsHi": {"status": "Success", "statusCode": 200, "errorDescription": "", "error": "{}", "data": {"_id": "641b55632d1dcce176ba377d", "hi": null, "schemeId": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8"}}, "applicationChannels": []}, "__N_SSG": true} {"id": "OAyLHI0B1csUTixB_uK-", "fields": {"beneficiaryState": ["West Bengal"], "schemeShortTitle": "Ahs", "level": "State", "nodalMinistryName": null, "schemeCategory": ["Housing & Shelter"], "schemeName": "Akanksha Housing Scheme", "schemeCloseDate": null, "slug": "ahs", "briefDescription": "Akanksha Housing Scheme was launched by the Housing Department, Government of West Bengal on 28/02/2014 to provide housing to the serving State Government employees.

\n", "age": {"ews": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "sc": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "general": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "obc": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "st": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "female": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}, "widowed": {"gte": 0, "lte": 100}}, "tags": ["Housing", "West Bengal", "State Government Employees"]}, "highlight": {}}

ctus.text: The name of this welfare scheme is Akanksha Housing Scheme. It is also known as Ahs. Akanksha Housing Scheme was launched by the Housing Department, Government of West Bengal on 28/02/2014 to provide housing to the serving State Government employees. gov. in/general-terms-condition Tags associated with the scheme include: Housing, State Government Employees, West Bengal. {"pageProps": {"schemeData": {"_id": "641b55458ed5b17cf6fc26c8", "en": {"basicDetails": {"schemeOpenDate": "2014-02-28", "schemeCloseDate": null, "state": {"value": 19, "label": "West Bengal"}, "nodalMinistryName": null, "nodalDepartmentName": {"value": 19999921, "label": "Housing Department"}, "otherMinistryName": null, "otherDepartmentNames": null, "targetBeneficiaries": [{"value": "individual", "label": "Individual"}], "schemeSubCategory": [{"value": "Housing", "label": "Housing"}], "dbtScheme": null, "implementingAgency": null, "tags": ["Housing", "State Government Employees", "West Bengal"], "schemeName": "Akanksha Housing Scheme", "schemeShortTitle": "Ahs", "level": {"value": "state", "label": "State"}, "schemeCategory": [{"value": "628ce7d2d6d1a3bde46852c2", "label": "Housing & Shelter"}], "schemeType": null}, "schemeContent": {"references": [{"title": "West Bengal Housing Website", "url": " https://wbhousing.

gov. in/general-terms-condition"}], "schemeImageUrl": "https://www. wb. , total price \u20b944,45,400/-"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "2. PREMIUM for employees with grade pay Between \u20b9 7601/- to \u20b9 8899/-, built-up area is 1273 sq. feet.

It consists of three bedrooms, one drawing cum Dining, one kitchen, two balconies, two toilets, & one water closet, available at the rate of \u20b9 3100/- per Sq. ft. , total price \u20b939,46,300/-"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "3. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Teaching/ non-teaching staff of non Govt. School & Colleges/Universities etc. even if those Institutions are aided or sponsored by state Govt.

"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Employees of various companies/undertakings like WBPDCL, WBSEDCL, CSTC, CTC, SBSTC, NBSTC, WBTEDCL, WBHIDCO, KMDA, KIT, KMWSA and etc. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Retired but reemployed Govt. employees. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "After you\u2019ve uploaded the scanned copies of the documents, click Submit. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "You must generate a challan using the internet system and deposit Rs. 25,000 in any Bank of Baroda branch as Application Fees.

"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Your application will be successfully submitted. "}]}]}, {"type": "ul_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Application must be made online only. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "No applicant is permitted to submit more than one application in this project.
